attributes.action: Investigate puppy farming and shut them down
attributes.background: I brought a puppy 8 days ago for my daughter from a woman who travels to Wales and collects these pups off farmers brings them back and sells them on out of the 8 days She has had this pup 5 have been spent in the vets as he became seriously ill and today had to be put to sleep

rejection.details:
We think you might want similar action to this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/130597
